infos.name: kitchen
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a kitchen. A normal one.

 You make out a refrigerator. Wow, isn't TextWorld just the best?[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The refrigerator contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You see a gleam over in a corner, where you can see a counter. [if there is something on the s_1]You see [a list of things on the s_1] on the counter.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]But the thing hasn't got anything on it. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if] You bend down to tie your shoe. When you stand up, you notice a stove. The stove is usual.[if there is something on the s_2] On the stove you can see [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] But the thing is empty.[end if] You see a kitchen island. [if there is something on the s_3]On the kitchen island you can see [a list of things on the s_3].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3]But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] screen door leading east. There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] wooden door leading west. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the south.

infos.name: bedroom
infos.desc:
You've entered a bedroom.

 If you haven't noticed it already, there seems to be something there by the wall, it's a chest drawer.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The chest drawer contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The chest drawer is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You see [if c_1 is locked]a locked[else if c_1 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] antique trunk in the room.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The antique trunk contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] Were you looking for a king-size bed? Because look over there, it's a king-size bed. The king-size bed is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_0] On the king-size bed you see [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] However, the king-size bed, like an empty king-size bed, has nothing on it. You think about smashing the king-size bed to bits, throwing the bits in the dump, etc, until you get bored.[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] wooden door leading east.

infos.name: backyard
infos.desc:
You're now in the backyard.

 You smell an interesting smell, and follow it to a set of chairs. [if there is something on the s_10]You see [a list of things on the s_10] on the set of chairs. Wow! Just like in the movies![end if][if there is nothing on the s_10]Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though.[end if] You scan the room for a bbq, and you find a bbq. [if there is something on the s_8]On the bbq you see [a list of things on the s_8].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_8]However, the bbq, like an empty bbq, has nothing on it. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if] You see a patio table. The patio table is typical.[if there is something on the s_9] On the patio table you can make out [a list of things on the s_9].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_9] The patio table appears to be empty.[end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] screen door leading west. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: living room
infos.desc:
You arrive in a living room. An ordinary kind of place.

 You see a couch. [if there is something on the s_5]You see [a list of things on the s_5] on the couch. It doesn't get more TextWorld than this![end if][if there is nothing on the s_5]But there isn't a thing on it.[end if] You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a low table. The low table is usual.[if there is something on the s_6] On the low table you see [a list of things on the s_6].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6] But the thing is empty, unfortunately. Hm. Oh well[end if] You see a tv. [if there is something on the s_7]On the tv you can see [a list of things on the s_7].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_7]However, the tv, like an empty tv, has nothing on it.[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: bathroom
infos.desc:
You have walked into a bathroom. Not the bathroom you'd expect. No, this is a bathroom.

 You can make out a toilet.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The toilet contains [a list of things in the c_3]. Suddenly, you bump your head on the ceiling, but it's not such a bad bump that it's going to prevent you from looking at objects and even things.[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] What a letdown! The toilet is empty![end if] You see [if c_4 is locked]a locked[else if c_4 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] bath, which looks typical, in the room.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The bath contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] What a letdown! The bath is empty![end if] You see a sink. [if there is something on the s_4]You see [a list of things on the s_4] on the sink.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4]Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though.[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the south.

infos.name: garden
infos.desc:
Well how about that, you are in the place we're calling the garden. You begin looking for stuff.



You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: wooden door
infos.desc: The wooden door looks commanding. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: screen door
infos.desc: it is what it is, a screen door [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: chest drawer
infos.desc: The chest drawer looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: antique trunk
infos.desc: The antique trunk looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: refrigerator
infos.desc: The refrigerator looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: toilet
infos.desc: The toilet looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: bath
infos.desc: The bath looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]
